website_summaries.verdict: A cozy, affordable tabletop heater with an 8-foot heat radius.
pros: move it where you need it
A good option for the porch, deck, or patio

customer_reviews.title: Terrible unless you can keep it 🔥 lit.
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to other reviews. Maybe 6 uses of this heater has resulted in it not starting or shutting off without warning. I tried the small cylinders as well as a 20lb tank connected via extension hose. Same result. In addition some sort of oily mess drips out of the housing when lit. I’m assuming it’s from incomplete combustion. If you can keep it fired up it’s OK...right now it’s a useless decoration on our deck. AVOID
customer_reviews.author: petwog

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just got this product. It was about $100 so for the price it appears to be a pretty good value. Assembly was not overly difficult as some of the parts were already partially put together but no complaints. I gave it a test run last night and again this am. It worked pretty well again for $100. The gas door isa. Bit rough and requires caution. I will likely sand it down. The heat is throws off is not massive as it uses a small disposable propane tank. I bought an adapter for a larger tank and will try that as well but mostly pretty pleased and the product looks pretty darn nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: larneystone

customer_reviews.title: I Wish I Had Not Purchased -- Doesn't Operate
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrival this little guy -- wondering if there's a line blockage...(?) I certainly do not wish to disassemble the whole thing and ship back and forth. Amazon chat is so nice -- but nothing they can do when outside ship window anyway. Also be advised I wish I hadn't tossed my old one out -- I would have cannibalized some parts -- like the base, which used to have a notch for an extension hose. Everything about this device is way cheaper in quality than just 10 years ago. I get it -- everyone has to get the highest margins on their products. Too bad. So at least you are forewarned now.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great heater. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a different manufacture table top heater. I have two full size Fire Sense heaters and could not speak more highly of them. However the table top works like the full size but the fit on the front door doesn't match. Beware all the edges where the small gas bottle is installed are like a razor's edge. Not finished just cut. Poor workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This was delivered Oct. 6, 2015, and ...
customer_reviews.text: This was delivered Oct. 6, 2015, and didn't really work correctly, but after a few tries, my husband got it to work. Yesterday was the 1st time it worked perfectly, and today it doesn't work at all! The igniter won't light and there is no gas going thru to light it with a match. I did buy the insurance, now I have to go through the hassle of trying to get it replaced. I first looked on the site I got it and it says no refunds/exchanges. Uggh!!
customer_reviews.author: San Dee

customer_reviews.title: heat wanted
customer_reviews.text: we wanted to have some heat in our 3 car garage. with one of 3 garage doors open, it gave decent heat around our chairs with gas tank in side heater on high heat lasted 2 hours. i then purchased the 10 foot hose so i can use a larger out door grill propane tank.i have not tried this out yet but it should work out fine.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy construction but puts out some nice heat
customer_reviews.text: If I didn't know better, I'd think this tabletop heater was cool. But I also own a full size Fire Sense heater, which I ordered with optional, extra thick stainless steel. It's hard to believe they came from the same company. The tabletop model has subpar fit and finish, the propane bottle fits so poorly that its label gets scraped off when you screw it in, and the dang thing is really touchy to light. I will say it works great once lit, and burns for a surprising length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Boulderdog

customer_reviews.title: We purchased this to keep warm in a mess tent ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to keep warm in a mess tent while camping. It works okay as long as you are nearby. Heat output is subpar, even on high (and remember this is in a tent with no wind). With that said, we've found that it drains a bottle in as little as an hour on high. So depending on your need, this may not be the most efficient heater for you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hadden

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Horrible instructions. Horrible manufacturing. Horrible assembly. Horrible quality. It’s hard to believe a company with such horrible products can stay in business.
customer_reviews.author: Bayview

customer_reviews.title: Short tank life
customer_reviews.text: I am using this heater in Arizona and have found that the tank usually lasts for one nights usage. I also sustained a nasty gash on my hand from the sharp edges on the housing while inserting the gas tank into the unit. I wear heavy leather gloves now to change out the tank.
customer_reviews.author: paul allen

customer_reviews.title: After 2 or 3 uses, it's just Scrap Metal
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after two or three uses - thermocouple-valve failed, and is not user-repairable. Never really provided enough warmth anyway, unless you sit right under it, then it's too hot.
customer_reviews.author: Gadget Steve

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect addition for our patio! We can’t wait to use it more this fall and winter! It allows us to have more use out of the porch!
customer_reviews.author: alysia

customer_reviews.title: Propane door edges a little sharp nothing a dremel tool couldn't handle
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly quick to change tanks,option to hook up to 20 lbs tank with adapter hose kit
customer_reviews.author: Edward M Majewski

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to light and it heats as advertises
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made heater. It is easy to light and it heats as advertises. Beware however that 10,000 BTU's is not a lot of heat. It is perfect for a small table top but if you want to heat a large space go with a big stand up model.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Maldeis

customer_reviews.title: Works well if you only need it one time.
customer_reviews.text: When we received this, it was a lot of work to put together. The cylinder on top was bent. No big deal as long as it worked ok. However, we used it one time and now it won't work at all. It really doesn't make me happy to pay almost 100 dollars for something and only be able to use it once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Received this heater and when we started assembling it we found that the wrench was missing and the basket the goes over the heater was broken. We were replacing our old patio heater of the same brand so luckily had parts to swap over.
customer_reviews.author: Enid Barnesworthy

customer_reviews.title: Watch Out!
customer_reviews.text: Worked OK for a while but very difficult to light even with the suggested on/off procedure. Got a pilot light but you might sit for 5 or more minutes to get it to light. Never knew when it was going to work or not. Never did work when connected to 5 lb tank. Latest incident recently where it finally lit but the flame was low and I thought the fuel was running low. Not quite. After a few minutes the thing erupted in a ball of flame until I finally could turn off the fuel supply. This thing is great if you want to remove unwanted facial hair. Will be off to the dump later today.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Graphics

customer_reviews.title: Fire Senseless
customer_reviews.text: Total junk. Do not buy this product, it is so badly manufactured as to be unsafe. Parts do not fit together properly. Returned after attempting assembly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Does not generate enough heat. Unable to connect to standard size propane tank
customer_reviews.author: badamsios

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly works great. First time lighting takes awhile but once you get that first light and let the residue burn off subsequent lightings are a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Parke

customer_reviews.title: as describe.
customer_reviews.text: as describe. A little hard to start the pilot light but it works
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Patio heater
customer_reviews.text: I was able to put it together following the instructions, it worked great except that the top part was badly scratched, amazone was wonderful in helping me getting it replaced. The unit works great when it is chilly out.
customer_reviews.author: Hala Kitmitto

customer_reviews.title: Dosent last
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in this, we haven't even had it 90 days and it stopped working. I guess I will have to purchase another one, but not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Shuts off
customer_reviews.text: Runs for just a few minutes and shuts off. I threw the box away so i cant return it. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together and use
customer_reviews.text: This heater came mostly assembled just had to screw a few pieces together and buy a propane bottle. It fired right up and put out a decent amount of heat. Its great for a small area.
customer_reviews.author: Janell32

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: these are not very good unless you are within 2 feet of the heater
customer_reviews.author: pablo norcal

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Heater
customer_reviews.text: This heater is perfect for our patio. It provided plenty of heat. We live in eastern NC so the weather does not get below freezing very long so it may struggle to stave off freezing temps. Its perfect for our environment
customer_reviews.author: nancy

customer_reviews.title: Good product, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: The heat reflector came dented, packaging could be better. I managed to remove most of the dents, other than that it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne Chamuler

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a present for some friends and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a present for some friends and it hasn't let them (or us) down. Eats propane kinda quickly but they all do.
customer_reviews.author: CAdreamer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Used it once and it quit after 15 minutes. Thought it may have been the tank. Put new tank in and no luck. I even hooked up a propane hose from a bulk tank and it still would not work. Unfortunately I ordered in summer and did not use till winter and therefore my return window lapsed. Big waste of a C-note for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald W.

customer_reviews.title: hard to put together, time consuming
customer_reviews.text: hard and time consuming to put together, was missing parts so we had to go buy them at a hardware store
customer_reviews.author: J. M.

customer_reviews.title: Propane Table Top Heater
customer_reviews.text: We do not have many cold nights in Florida, but when we do, this table top heater is perfect to have in the center of the patio table.
customer_reviews.author: Boogiegirl

customer_reviews.title: This is killer! Larger than expected but pumps out ...
customer_reviews.text: This is killer! Larger than expected but pumps out the heat. Must have for deck dwellers!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Cole

customer_reviews.title: Good out side table-top heater
customer_reviews.text: Good out side table-top heater. It's not easy on fuel working a high setting, but it's stable and ok to look at.
customer_reviews.author: Reno P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size Patio Heater but...
customer_reviews.text: The heater was easy to put together but the door for the propane cylinder has sharp edges and is difficult to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Shirey

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: uses propane a little faster then I would like. Great for short periods.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Clark

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I received it and the top was bent. I ordered it because I needed it for the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cool Heater
customer_reviews.text: Bought this heater to help stay warm outside of my RV while enjoying an evening cigar. It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Fat Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Table top Patio Heater
customer_reviews.text: I love my heater! I do however wish that the assembly instructions were more specific. It took too long to figure it out with just a diagram.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: great portable tabletop heater. easy to move around. heat is sufficient to be comfortable outside when theres a chill in the air.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: The heater works fine, the changing of the tanks is not easy ...
customer_reviews.text: The heater works fine, the changing of the tanks is not easy and the edges of the opening are sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Pavao

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I expected. The material and design are quite adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Al-Alami

customer_reviews.title: Junk - Do Not Purchase!!
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Worked a couple of times last spring, contacted seller for warranty parts, worked a few more times. Now this fall it won't work and there's apparently nothing I can do about it. Very expensive item for no warranty or return possibility.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool!
customer_reviews.text: This heater is really Cool. There is some assembly but it was very simple and it included the wrench to tighten the bolts, you'll need a Straight and Phillips screw driver though. I'm using mine with a hose to run off of a 20 lb. LP cylinder. It's very likely I'll be getting another one for around the campsite on cool nights.
customer_reviews.author: A&WROBER

customer_reviews.title: propane heater - Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: We really have enjoyed this heater. Recomend buying the hose to adapt to a grill type propane tank. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: michael moore

customer_reviews.title: Like the heater.
customer_reviews.text: The first heater did not work. Amazon promptly replaced it. Did not use it but one time, On the screen porch to keep plants ware during a cold snap.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Wackym

customer_reviews.title: Propane heater
customer_reviews.text: This will be perfect for tailgating.we can also use it on our patio for outdoor entertaining. It's going to be great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jo Johnson

customer_reviews.title: THE NOW HEAT HEATER
customer_reviews.text: I WAS HAPPY WHEN I HAD OPENED UP THE BOX TO SEE WHAT LOOKED TO BE A GOOD QAULITY PRODUCT BUT WHEN IT WAS TIME TO USE IT I WAS SHOCKED WHAT LITTLE HEAT CAME FROM THIS HEATER, TO BAD I THROW MY OTHER SMALL PATIO HEATER OUT BEFORE TRYING THIS ONE BECAUSE EVEN WITH RUST I WOULD HAVE BEEN HAPPIER WITH THE OLD ONE.
customer_reviews.author: shawn  p  farris

customer_reviews.title: Sweet
customer_reviews.text: We recently built a house in VA with a screened in Porch. The evenings can be cool and the table heater was perfect to make our evenings comfortable again. We don't stay out that long that fuel size an issue. Looking at taking the heater to our next tailgate. Will provide an update. May have to do a video of that one. Great product. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Easy, Functional, and Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This was put together in 15 minutes, it puts out enough heat to keep you warm in a 6ft area as long as the temp isn't below freezing. Looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: T-Family

customer_reviews.title: Patio heater
customer_reviews.text: We live in zone 7, and a nice patio. The heater is great. On nights in the 40-50 degrees the patio heater works great . Easy assembly and the popane is available at any hardware store. A grat addition. To our patio living.
customer_reviews.author: Tbird

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic heater
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this little propane heater, got the adaptor and hooked it up to a five gallon tank. Using our courtyard all the time in the evening now!
customer_reviews.author: Lonnell D. Nestie

customer_reviews.title: Starts out ok...down hill from there...
customer_reviews.text: Starts out ok....works just like we wanted...but after a few minutes the valve ices up and output goes so low it basically becomes worthless....
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The heater doesnt project heat anywhere close to a standard floor model- am going to be sending the thing back for a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Loulias

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great the 12 times i used it. Now it will light the pilot light and as long as I hold in button the pilot stays lit. However as soon as I let go the pilot goes out, even if I hold for 45 seconds. How do I get it repaired?
customer_reviews.author: JimBob Wat

customer_reviews.title: Dented upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: The Propane Table Top Patio Heater (stainless steel) arrived promptly. However, the top part, which reflects the heat, had two dents. Since it seemed well packed, I can only imagine that it got damaged at the factory, but this is just a guess. This was a gift, and the recipients didn't want to return it (because it was a hassle to disassemble and put all the parts back in the box). The heater works fine; it gives about a 3'-4' radius worth of heat. FYI: It doesn't come with the 1.02 lb. propane tank.
customer_reviews.author: Delma

customer_reviews.title: Please contact me
customer_reviews.text: I just recently tried to use this and it does not work. Please contact me on how I can return and get a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Hull

customer_reviews.title: Typical chinese construction
customer_reviews.text: Be forewarned, this product is made in China. As such, the workmanship is minimal and the materials substandard. No edge is finished. Just the action of changing the tank is guaranteed to provide your hand with one or more cuts from the sharp edges of the opening. Every piece is of the poorest quality of metal. The hardware is of the cheapest quality. Even if it works as advertised, I'm very unhappy with the typical chinese workmanship. Even the foam it was packed in is unrecycleable. Just more landfill.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Warmth
customer_reviews.text: My heater has just arrived. Because it's summer I haven't had the chance to use my new heater yet. I have a friend who has one. Because her's is so wonderful I had to have one I have no doubt that this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Works well, kept us warm on a 45 degree evening.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our porch. It's taller than expected but worked well. We put it on a small side table on the low setting and it kept 4 of us in light jackets, warm on a 45F evening. We sat around a table so we were maybe 3-4 ft from it. You won't be sitting next to it in shorts and sandals. If you have a lot of wind, it's probably not going to work well. Decent (not great) built quality. It seems the proper option for a patio like ours is the IR tube heaters wall mounted. They are prohibitively expensive for ones that don't fail constantly. This was a great alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Worman

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 seasons of being well kept
customer_reviews.text: Has been very well cared for (covered and stored when not in use) and has completely stopped working after just two seasons. The door to pop off for placing propane tanks into the unit is awful and cut my fingers multiple times - and we stopped using propane tanks very shortly after buying them and got the extension hose for using a gas grill size tank. It's basically a piece of junk in our patio now. Will look for a better quality replacement
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a couple of months
customer_reviews.text: Have had for 6 months and it has developed a leak by the pilot light have no way to return or get repaired by manufacturer waste of Money was great while it worked but expected it to last longer ran it in March through May now it is useless wont light burner because of leak
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No disappointment here
customer_reviews.text: This heater is a beast. Use it almost every night.. Very efficient and has worked perfectly for the last few months I’ve owned it..
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 winters, bad thermocouple cost $50 to replace
customer_reviews.text: And it's a real pain to replace the thermocouple on this unit, there are 3 wires and you have to take everything apart. Not replacing a $50 part on $80 item that lasted 2 winters. Went to manufacturers website (model 60662) and the link to the product manual is broken.
customer_reviews.author: Squidooster

customer_reviews.title: If a breeze at all you better be down wind to feel heat
customer_reviews.text: Did not send out as much heat than expected. If a breeze at all you better be down wind to feel heat. Will look into more industrial one like at restaurants that forces directional heat.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and hazardous
customer_reviews.text: This product is lovely to behold and sharp and a cutting hazard when loading the propane canisters. My partner cut his hand very badly on it. Please be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I love the propane table top heater
customer_reviews.text: I love the propane table top heater, but the propane does not last except for about 30 minutes, and I thought it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: In about 1 year of use, I have been able to get to work 2 times. Once when it was new and once after a replacement part came aftdr it stopped working. The manufacturer was honored the warranty but the warranty is short.
customer_reviews.author: C. W.

customer_reviews.title: Do not pay extra for assembly.  Item was not preassembled as requested and paid for.
customer_reviews.text: There was a dent in the lid even though package seemed to be sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Could pump more heat.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery, packaging & assembly were all fine. I set it up in my living room & ran it for about 30 minutes. The 10' radius claim is a mislead for sure, i'd call it more like 5'. Nice looking solid unit, ease of operation, quiet & no fumes. I hooked up a 5' line to a 20lb. tank. Will use outside on chilly nights & in my garage in the winter (not unattended) I have a main heat system but this will work before really cold weather sets in. This unit is good in all areas but really just needs more heat output.
customer_reviews.author: vivasantana

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Burns the 1lb. bottle of propane in 30 minutes. Very little heat, after a few minutes flame lowers to almost no heat. Hooked up the 20 lb. tank, had to buy a $20.00 hose and connector. Flame works better but really sucks the propane. Could be hand warmer but don't buy this heater if you want any kind of warmth.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as much heat as I had expected, but still good quality
customer_reviews.text: Simple assembly - quick to light, puts out decent heat but not enough for those really chilly nights/days. Overall good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TDoyle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted! Warm and cozy and perfect height for my back porch! It was shipped in a timely fashion and I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Packaging allows for damage during shipment
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and it arrived damaged due to very little protection on the sides of the box. The aluminum top was the part that was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It was okay.
customer_reviews.text: It worked. But, I was expecting more infrared. The infrared unit did not heat up all the way. But, what do you expect for the $.
customer_reviews.author: J Harry Blalock

customer_reviews.title: It works great as a foot heater but that's about it
customer_reviews.text: It works great as a foot heater but that's about it, I tried to use it for winters when we would be out side. I live in New Mexico so it doesn't get freezing cold, at lease it keeps my feet warm
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool--keeps me warm!
customer_reviews.text: Works well, though I haven't had much chance to use it yet. Waiting for warm days and cool nights! Looks cool though!
customer_reviews.author: First class shopper

customer_reviews.title: This product will cut you -- you will bleed.
customer_reviews.text: I can't say if the heater would have worked out well. In order to insert the propane can, you had to maneuver your hand(s) in such a way that the sharp edges of the metal edge cut me to shreds. I mean actual blood -- I had to use several band-aids. Needless to say, the heater was returned. Absolutely do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I would not suggest anyone buy this. I got it for my dad for Christmas and it never worked. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Walker

customer_reviews.title: Knocks off the chill.
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this to use on our screened in back porch so that smokers could be both outside and warm. It definitely serves the purpose!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: REALLY BAD PRODUCT  NEVER BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.text: update Jan 2015 never made it to the garbage so tried it again they added a video on how to replace the gas tank Great !! but ---- it worked about 5 times then it will no longer light. So - bottom line a piece of junk if I can not light it -- it serves no purpose What I do not understand is WHY??? Amazon keeps selling this?? I am unable to contact Amazon to report this travesty; maybe I should cancel my Prime membership?? UPDATE FEBRUARY 2015. Finally contacted Amazon - there were most helpful. I got a partial refund and am more than happy with that. Bought the NAPOLEON from Amazon perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CACTUS GARY

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to assemble, and creates a nice and warm toasty feeling from the table top!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie G

customer_reviews.title: This is a great table top heater for a home 3 miles from the beach in So. Cal.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the heater to add comfort when sitting around the table on our patio. Were we live, the temperature usually is in the 60s in the evening. This heater provides plenty of heat to enjoy the evening without bundling up.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Carson

customer_reviews.title: Good heater with a few adjustments
customer_reviews.text: This works well as described and will provide a warming radius of about 10 feet around a table. While the unit does take the small 1.02 lb propane tanks you really need to purchase an extension hose so you can attach it to a regular 20 lb tank. The small tanks only last about 45 minutes before they start to freeze up and make it necessary to plug another one in. We use this in South Carolina in a 3 sided enclosed porch and it keeps us warm during our evening outdoor dinners.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy L

customer_reviews.title: Christmas surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift to son-in-law who hasn't used it yet; but thinks it will be used often since family enjoys patio dinners. He likes it and would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Conway

customer_reviews.title: Can"t Heat Arizona
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to start and sometimes won't start at all. Tanks only last 1 to 2 hrs.at $4 ea Heating radius only 2 feet. Will return unit and get a Commerical Grade floor heater.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Bud

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Pilot light worked, but heater would not come on. It was supposed to help heat the deck for Holiday Party. Very disappointed. How do I get my money back? What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Table top heater - luke warm
customer_reviews.text: This works as a table top heater..... it'll keep you luke warm. If you have any wind what so ever, it turns into a metal center piece and you'll be cold. The heater does take those long Coleman 1.2lb tanks for little tailgate BBQ's, so that good. But other than huddling close to it, you won't get that much out of it. I suggest you spend an extra $50 and get a full size.
customer_reviews.author: Facility Manager

customer_reviews.title: Worst Thing I Have Ever Bought In My Life
customer_reviews.text: This gets 1 star only because zero is not an option. Of all the things I've ever bought in my life, this is the most worthless piece of s***. I have had several patio heaters, but none other than this one that you had to stand there for a minute or two pushing in a button hoping it was going to light. I had it for 3 days of trying and through it the trash, $90.00 later. Total garbage. Buy it and prepare to be ridiculed. Total garbage.
